Text:
Usually x-art is fantastic, but to be honest I've never seen a guy who looks as much of a douche as the guy in this video.  The only thing that could make this guy look any more douchy would be if he had just walked off the set of Jersey Shore with double popped collars and then literally sprayed on a fake tan. At first, the fact that he looks like a complete tool didn't bother me; the girls are super hot, but as as the film progressed, anger built up inside of me like a smoldering flame.  

"How the hell is life fair if this douche is banging not one, but two of the hottest girls this side of Eden and I will almost certainly never pull tail like that?  I mean sure you can't watch a MFF without a guy, but why would you pick a guy who looks like he bullied you back in high school?" 

 In addition, it appears he has a wart of some kind on his penis.  Such class. Maybe he should get some more fake tan. For his penis.
